modName: Better Shrouded Armor by Half-Dead - Female gloves fix
summary: Better Shrouded Armor by Half-Dead - Female gloves fix
descriptionHtml:
Better Shrouded Armor by Half-Dead - Female gloves fix
Original : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12015
This fix does not contain the original files. You will need the original mod first, than apply this fix.

The original was missing the .nif files for the female gloves. I just duplicated the male files and renamed them for female.

Also check out the 1st person hands fix by Scepth
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20690

Half-Dead if you are reading this, we all love this armor and we hope to see updates on it.
author: creasta
